content.raw: When you say parse sdf into classes, do you mean c++ classes? Will there be a class representing a `<visual>` tag, etc? Is the plan to require future PRs to update both [the xml that describes sdformat](#!/osrf/sdformat/src/a6267c4e7b7e47da4cb8ee06bbcd4675f14c1670/sdf/?at=default) and these classes, or are these replacing the xml files?
content.html: When you say parse sdf into classes, do you mean c++ classes? Will there be a class representing a <visual> tag, etc? Is the plan to require future PRs to update both the xml that describes sdformat and these classes, or are these replacing the xml files?
